website_summaries.verdict: It may take a little while to start working, but this product will lighten your dark spots and leave you with a healthy glow.
pros: Evens skin tone and reduces dark spots and redness with once- or twice-a-day treatment
Hydrates skin and leaves it smooth
Doesn't leave a residue on your skin
cons: High price could put it out of reach to those on a tight budget

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for about a month and LOVE IT! I have oily
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month and LOVE IT! I have oily, acne prone skin that I'm constantly battling and get a lot of acne scars. Within Two weeks I saw a difference in my not-so-bad acne scars which had completely faded. The really bad scars are still there and visible but have also faded. I've used the even better line before when I was in high school and the price kept me away but I'll probably continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: CLINIQUE...Why the change?
customer_reviews.text: Clinique dark spot USED to be a GREAT product. Sincé the new combo, after a couple of months, nothing for dark spot reoval.. Well my this is my last purchase of this new combo. Dark spot product used to be the best. But just a thing of the past. Sometimes as with everything... Don't change a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: After using hundreds of creams and treatments, this serum is the only thing that took away the stains. If you have tried everything like me and nothing has worked, I assure you that this is going to be useful, but I also use the cream with spf of this brand, dis the time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived very quickly and in excellent condition. This is great product to go on before you put your makeup on in the morning. It does not get oily at all my skin just absorbs it nicely and I have dry to normal skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this product actually worked. Not only did it help give me a more even skin tone, I notice my skin has less breakouts when I use it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shi

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 side was working, tried buying 2 times.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product as I enjoyed the smaller version I bought at ulta. First time I bought it only 1 side worked and the other did not dispense any product. Fine, returned it and maybe it was a bad one. Ordered another and same thing. Idk if they just sent the same one from laziness or what but I'm not ordering another. Seller does not quality control products.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It lightens the skin. And also makes the skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mystical

customer_reviews.title: It Acctually Works
customer_reviews.text: It takes awhile but it really does lighten dark spots. It performed better than the less expensive products that I Jane tried.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: wrong product
customer_reviews.text: i bought it months ago for my mom, and until today we found we got wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Dazed Lever

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Clinique has skimped on the quality of this product SIGNIFICANTLY! The original product was great and effective, which is why I ordered it again. However the new pump bottle that is comes in now is cheap. The seal between the two formulas had broken down when the bottle arrived. only the thinner of the two cremes will pump out of the bottle, rendering the product completely useless, and an absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C Tew

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Hope they stay at the same good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. slowly gets rid of dark spots. It's actually NEW. Believe me I can tell. The color was not dark. I've bought this at dept stores before.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, i can see the change in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hulksbuys

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as my expected but it is good anyway .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pump from both sides
customer_reviews.text: I had received a free sample of this product and it worked wonders on my acne scars. But I'm disappointed that it's not pumping from both sides. I did read the reviews before purchasing but thought maybe the issue had been fixed. Not too thrilled about the money I spent on this only to not have it work properly
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly persun

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product daily, as directed for two months now and my dark spots are still there.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: No noticeable lightening of brown spots. Save your money 😞
customer_reviews.author: karen ryan

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I have been very happy with the results. My unhappiness is because the container is only dispensing product from one side, the other side is empty therefore not getting full effect. I will not buy this product from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Pump does not work properly. Pump is supposed to dispense two products side by side, but only one side works. I like this product and usually buy it from my local dept. store (now closed) It has always worked before, but this one I received from Amazon is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not too good.
customer_reviews.text: This product looked like a world class serum that would do wonders but nooo!!! The shocking truth is that it wasn't that good in clearing my dark acne spots. I recommend you try out other products.
customer_reviews.author: Bamidele A.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle does not pump product correctly
customer_reviews.text: Bottle does not pump product correctly, this product is supposed to be a dual cream that gets dispensed equally, when you pump it, instead only one side of the product comes out. I already got a refund for it. but it is good to appoint the issue.
customer_reviews.author: B. Torres

customer_reviews.title: the dispencer dsnt work
customer_reviews.text: i am allergic to this product the dispenser doesn't work only one side of it works . for what you pay this product should work if the product comes out properly thanks clinic
customer_reviews.author: Allison Chen

customer_reviews.title: lost Product leaky
customer_reviews.text: When I receive the product it was leaking out. From the Cannister. The bottom was off. Lost about 30% of the product. Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: lake b.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it smells nice, observe quickly in the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Djemesi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a while and no change at all on my dark spots. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: VVVV

customer_reviews.title: Great priduct
customer_reviews.text: It is truly working as claimed by Clinique. Thank you so much:)
customer_reviews.author: Dotty McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great face product for reducing dark spots
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase this item from Macy’s but happen to see it on amazon. The price was such a great deal for the larger size! I’ve used this product for over 4 years and it helps reduce dark spots as long as you continuously use once or twice a day. There is no scent to it and actually makes your skin feels alive.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Y

customer_reviews.title: Minimal lightening
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about 4 weeks now on dark spots on my chest. I see minimal improvement if any. I used a Skin Medica lightening product in the past that worked very well. Thought I'd try this because I like Clinique and the price was better.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: It took a while, but I have seen visible ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a while, but I have seen visible improvements in the evenness of my skin tone! I went through an entire bottle before I saw these results, but after purchasing the second, I get frequent complements on my complexion. Will continue to purchase this, even though its a tad on the pricier side!
customer_reviews.author: NurseK

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged, the pump doesn’t work, and a lot of product had leaked out. I will not buy from this provider again.
customer_reviews.author: kalyka konda

customer_reviews.title: Dispensed product unequally
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how important the contents of the white chamber is because it emptied about 3 weeks before the green chamber. There’s one pump to equally dispense product from both sides so I don’t think I did anything wrong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by the Clinique rep. I've been using clinique for over 15 years. I used this night and day for almost 2 months with no results; colossal waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The Results!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far no results. I have only used it for one week. We’ll see!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is good marketing, since most people would give up and ...
customer_reviews.text: A friendly clerk talked me into trying this version of the product. Same product, different container. The little pumps quit working, with half of the corrector inaccessible. My husband broke the container so I could access the remaining. I'm sure this is good marketing, since most people would give up and buy more, but that doubles the cost of the moisturizer. I mixed the two tubes and continue to use the moisturizer, but I'll never again buy this product in this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Conn

product_meta.title: Clinique Even Better Clinical Dark Spot Corrector & Optimizer, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Clinique Even Better Clinical Dark Spot Corrector
feature_bullets: Dermatologist developed to be safe and comfortable
See results starting in as little as 4 weeks
